definitions.definition: To stimulate oneself sexually , especially by use of one’s hand or a sex toy made for this purpose, often to the point of ejaculation or orgasm .
examples: I'm looking for some hot videos to masturbate to.

definitions.definition: To stimulate someone else sexually without penetration of the penis .

To stimulate or please oneself by means of anything, not necessarily sexual, that does not get them anywhere; something that wastes their time; something that does not help others or achieve any important goal.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To stimulate oneself sexually , especially by use of one’s hand or a sex toy made for this purpose, often to the point of ejaculation or orgasm .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , colloquial ) To stimulate someone else sexually without penetration of the penis .

( informal , derogatory ) To stimulate or please oneself by means of anything, not necessarily sexual, that does not get them anywhere; something that wastes their time; something that does not help others or achieve any important goal.
